metadata.name: Challenge Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you lock/unlock and clear/unclear challenges.
You can also import/export your challenge data. The import JSON uses this format for modded challenges: "M-{challengeName}{modId}". If you remove "M-", this is the same format you'll find in Repentogon's challengesX.json files which are located here: C:\Users\username\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Repentance\Repentogon
JSON values: [list] [*]-1 = Locked and not cleared (if lockable) [*]0 = Unlocked and not cleared [*]1 = Unlocked and cleared [/list]
If you want to set specific clear counts for modded challenges, you can edit the challengesX.json files directly. It's too easy to freeze the UI doing this through the API.
This is a companion mod to: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3130836503]Character Shenanigans[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3131711250]Stat and Achievement Shenanigans[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2932859748]Win Streak Shenanigans[/url] [/list]
Modded challenges are supported.
Note: If you're on a small screen, you can scale the GUI elements with: [list] [*]Tools -> Style Editor -> Fonts -> global scale [*]Ctrl + mouse wheel [*]C:\Users\username\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Repentance\Repentogon\imgui.ini [/list]
